title: 50+ Gifts for Music Lovers of Every Genre: Shop Thoughtful Presents for K-Pop, Hip-Hop & Rock Fans
summary: Whether they're a musician or avid playlist maker, there's something for every music fan on your list.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Gift-giving season can seem never-ending, with birthdays and holidays being a year-round presence. This can make finding unique and thoughtful gifts a challenge as you try to outdo the previous year’s pick. The good news: If you have a music lover in your life, then your gifting options are practically endless. Shop the Best Gifts for Music Lovers, by Genre: Best Gift for K-Pop Lovers: Pop Mart The Monsters (Labubu) Blind Box V1 – $49 Best Gift for Rock Lovers: AeroBand Smart Guitar – $369 Best Gift for Hip Hop Lovers: A$AP Rocky x Ray-Ban Wayfarer Puffer – $202 Best Gift for Pop Lovers: So High School Candle Duo – $80 Best Gift for Country Lovers: Tecovas Cartwright Boot – $345 Best Gift for Musicians: MasterClass Subscription – $10 Your first thought may be to check out AirPod deals or Bose headphones sales , but before you click “add to cart,” dig a little deeper and consider what genre of mus…

title: After ‘Top Chef,’ Padma Lakshmi Wants to Show How People Really Eat
summary: Padma Lakshmi’s new book, Padma’s All American, is a record of the years she spent traveling for Taste the Nation | Cover courtesy Knopf | Collage by Masood Shah For her show Taste the Nation, Padma Lakshmi traveled across the country to cook, eat, and immerse herself in different immigrant communi…
